trans-unit.source: Contains properties that are used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Contient les propriétés utilisées pour contraindre l'ensemble d'objets <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> retourné par un appel à <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> contains properties that are used to constrain the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method against the tracking data in a database used by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> contient les propriétés utilisées pour contraindre l'ensemble d'objets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> retourné par la méthode <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> contre les données de suivi dans une base de données utilisée par le <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> in the collection of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> must correspond to a workflow instance which has tracking data associated with it in the database that meets the conditions specified by the properties of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Chaque <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> dans la collection d'objets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> retournée par un appel à <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> doit correspondre à une instance de workflow associée à des données de suivi dans la base de données qui satisfait les conditions spécifiées par les propriétés du <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: Le tableau suivant indique les valeurs initiales des propriétés d'une instance de la classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Value

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> vide.

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Référence Null (`Nothing` en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Référence Null (`Nothing` en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: These values specify that a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> should return a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.
trans-unit.target: Ces valeurs spécifient qu'un appel à <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> doit retourner un objet <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> pour chaque instance de workflow qui a des données de suivi dans la base de données.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates creating an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: L'exemple suivant illustre la création d'une instance de la classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Cet exemple est tiré de l'exemple du Kit de développement logiciel Workflow Monitor (SDK).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez [exemple analyse de flux de travail](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Resets the properties of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions" /> to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Rétablit les valeurs par défaut des propriétés du <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: Le tableau suivant indique les valeurs initiales des propriétés d'une instance de la classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Value

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> vide.

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Référence Null (`Nothing` en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Référence Null (`Nothing` en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: These values specify that a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> should return a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.
trans-unit.target: Ces valeurs spécifient qu'un appel à <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> doit retourner un objet <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> pour chaque instance de workflow qui a des données de suivi dans la base de données.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the upper limit of the time period that, together with <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />, is used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient ou définit un <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> qui spécifie la limite supérieure de la période qui, avec <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />, est utilisée pour contraindre l'ensemble d'objets <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> retourné par un appel à <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the upper limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> qui spécifie la limite supérieure de la période utilisée pour faire correspondre des instances de workflow à un état spécifié par <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: La valeur par défaut est <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> contraint l'ensemble d'objets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> retourné par un appel à <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> aux instances de workflow qui ont le <xref:System.Type> spécifié par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, qui ont l'état spécifié par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> pendant la période spécifiée par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> et <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, et qui ont des données extraites qui correspondent au moins à l'un des objets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> spécifiés par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> is inclusive.
trans-unit.target: La valeur <xref:System.DateTime> spécifiée par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> est inclusive.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d'informations sur la façon dont l'état d'une instance de workflow est mise en correspondance, consultez la propriété <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Si `WorkflowStatus` est null, `StatusMaxDateTime` et `StatusMinDateTime` sont ignorés.

trans-unit.source: All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called.
trans-unit.target: Toutes les instances de workflow sont retournées lorsque `GetWorkflows` est appelé.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates setting the StatusMaxDateTime property.
trans-unit.target: L'exemple de code suivant illustre la définition de la propriété StatusMaxDateTime.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Cet exemple est tiré de l'exemple du Kit de développement logiciel Workflow Monitor (SDK).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez [exemple analyse de flux de travail](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that, together with <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />, is used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient ou définit un <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> qui, avec <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />, est utilisé pour contraindre l'ensemble d'objets <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> retourné par un appel à <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the lower limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> qui spécifie la limite inférieure de la période utilisée pour faire correspondre des instances de workflow à un état spécifié par <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: La valeur par défaut est <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> contraint l'ensemble d'objets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> retourné par un appel à <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> aux instances de workflow qui ont le <xref:System.Type> spécifié par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, qui ont l'état spécifié par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> pendant la période spécifiée par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> et <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, et qui ont des données extraites qui correspondent au moins à l'un des objets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> spécifiés par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> is inclusive.
trans-unit.target: La valeur <xref:System.DateTime> spécifiée par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> est inclusive.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d'informations sur la façon dont l'état d'une instance de workflow est mise en correspondance, consultez la propriété <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Si `WorkflowStatus` est null, `StatusMaxDateTime` et `StatusMinDateTime` sont ignorés.

trans-unit.source: All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called.
trans-unit.target: Toutes les instances de workflow sont retournées lorsque `GetWorkflows` est appelé.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates setting the StatusMinDateTime property.
trans-unit.target: L'exemple de code suivant illustre la définition de la propriété StatusMinDateTime.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Cet exemple est tiré de l'exemple du Kit de développement logiciel Workflow Monitor (SDK).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez [exemple analyse de flux de travail](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of data extract values which are used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient ou définit une liste de valeurs d'extractions de données utilisées pour contraindre l'ensemble d'objets <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> retourné par un appel à <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.List`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue" /> objects that contains specified values to be matched for data extracted from the workflow instance or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.List`1" /> d'objets <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue" /> qui contient les valeurs spécifiées à mettre en correspondance pour les données extraites de l'instance de workflow ou une référence null (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> contraint l'ensemble d'objets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> retourné par un appel à <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> aux instances de workflow qui ont le <xref:System.Type> spécifié par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, qui ont l'état spécifié par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> pendant la période spécifiée par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> et <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, et qui ont des données extraites qui correspondent au moins à l'un des objets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> spécifiés par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> can contain <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> records that contain data that is extracted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> peut contenir des enregistrements <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> qui contiennent des données extraites du workflow.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> property contains <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects that specify certain values for this extracted data.
trans-unit.target: La propriété <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> contient des objets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> qui spécifient certaines valeurs pour ces données extraites.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance meets the other criteria specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the extracted data stored in the database for a workflow instance must match one or more of the extracted data values specified by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> property for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object to be returned for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Si l'instance de workflow répond aux autres critères spécifiés par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> et que <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> n'est pas une référence null (`Nothing`), les données extraites stockées dans la base de données pour une instance de workflow doivent correspondre à une ou plusieurs des valeurs de données extraites spécifiées par la propriété <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> pour un objet <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> à retourner pour l'instance de workflow.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by the values of the extracted data for any of the workflow instances in the database.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> est une référence null (`Nothing`), l'ensemble d'objets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> retourné ne sera contraint par les valeurs des données extraites pour aucune des instances de workflow dans la base de données.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus" /> value that is used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient ou définit la valeur <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus" /> utilisée pour contraindre l'ensemble d'objets <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> retourné par un appel à <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus" /> values or null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Une des valeurs <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus" /> ou null (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The default is null (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: La valeur par défaut est null (<see langword="Nothing" />).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> contraint l'ensemble d'objets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> retourné par un appel à <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> aux instances de workflow qui ont le <xref:System.Type> spécifié par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, qui ont l'état spécifié par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> pendant la période spécifiée par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> et <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, et qui ont des données extraites qui correspondent au moins à l'un des objets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> spécifiés par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance is considered to have a status that matches <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> if the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> received for that workflow instance before or during the specified time period has its <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property set to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> value that maps to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=nameWithType> value specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Une instance de workflow est considérée comme ayant un état qui correspond à <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> si le dernier <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> reçu pour cette instance de workflow avant ou pendant la période spécifiée a sa propriété <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> définie à une valeur <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> qui mappe à la valeur <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=nameWithType> spécifiée par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow instance must have a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> that is configured for the appropriate <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: Par conséquent, le <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> pour l'instance de workflow doit avoir un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configuré pour la valeur <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> appropriée.

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that have been sent in workflow tracking records can be matched.
trans-unit.target: Seules les valeurs <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> envoyées dans des enregistrements de suivi de workflow peuvent être mises en correspondance.

trans-unit.source: If no workflow tracking records have been sent for the workflow instance, the workflow instance is considered to have a status of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus.Created?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Si aucun enregistrement de suivi de workflow n'a été envoyé pour l'instance de workflow, celle-ci est considérée comme ayant un état <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus.Created?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the mapping between <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> values.
trans-unit.target: Le tableau suivant indique le mappage entre les valeurs <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> et <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>.

trans-unit.source: TrackingWorkflowEvent value
trans-unit.target: Valeur de TrackingWorkflowEvent

trans-unit.source: WorkflowStatus value
trans-unit.target: Valeur de WorkflowStatus

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> is null (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by status; in other words, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> est null (`Nothing`), l'ensemble d'objets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> retourné ne sera pas contraint par état ; en d'autres termes, un objet <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> sera retourné pour toute instance de workflow qui correspond aux paramètres spécifiés par les autres propriétés de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates setting the WorkflowStatus property.
trans-unit.target: L'exemple de code suivant illustre la définition de la propriété WorkflowStatus.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Cet exemple est tiré de l'exemple du Kit de développement logiciel Workflow Monitor (SDK).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez [exemple analyse de flux de travail](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the workflow instance <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient ou définit le <see cref="T:System.Type" /> d'instance de workflow utilisé pour contraindre l'ensemble d'objets <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> retourné par un appel à <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
The default is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: La valeur par défaut est une référence Null (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> contraint l'ensemble d'objets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> retourné par un appel à <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> aux instances de workflow qui ont le <xref:System.Type> spécifié par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, qui ont l'état spécifié par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> pendant la période spécifiée par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> et <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, et qui ont des données extraites qui correspondent au moins à l'un des objets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> spécifiés par <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by workflow <xref:System.Type>; in other words, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> est une référence null (`Nothing`), l'ensemble d'objets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> retourné ne sera pas contraint par <xref:System.Type> de workflow ; en d'autres termes, un objet <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> sera retourné pour toute instance de workflow qui correspond aux paramètres spécifiés par les autres propriétés de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
